tp:taxonomyPackage.tp:name: The annual SEC Reporting Taxonomy (SRT)
tp:taxonomyPackage.tp:description: The 2024 SEC Reporting Taxonomy (SRT) includes elements to meet U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) requirements for financial schedules required by the SEC, condensed consolidating financial information for guarantors, and disclosures about oil and gas producing activities. The SRT also includes dimensional elements whose underlying recognition and measurement are not specified by GAAP. The SRT is intended to be used with other taxonomies that meet SEC requirements.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: All SRT components and five related SEC Taxonomies - DEI, COUNTRY, CURRENCY
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This entry point includes ALL components for the SRT. Five related SEC Taxonomies are also imported - DEI, COUNTRY, STPR, EXCH and CURRENCY.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: All SRT components except for doc and ref linkbases; and three related SEC Taxonomies - DEI, COUNTRY, CURRENCY.
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This entry point includes all components for the SRT except for document and reference linkbases. Three related SEC Taxonomies are also imported - DEI, COUNTRY, and CURRENCY.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: Elements only
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This is the schema file (elements) for the 2024 SEC Reporting Taxonomy (SRT).

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: 2023 US GAAP Element to 2024 SRT Element Mapping
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This entry point includes all SRT elements with mapping from the 2023 US GAAP Taxonomy by arcrole/dep-concept-deprecatedConcept.
